tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gene_editing_history (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    experiment_date DATE,
    gene_editor VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE gene_editing_experiments (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    editing_technique VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    experiment_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE GeneEditingExperiment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  result TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_experiment FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES GeneEditingExperiment(id)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulationCompliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  regulatory_body TEXT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_experiment FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES GeneEditingExperiment(id)
)

CREATE TABLE ApprovalRecords (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  approval_status TEXT,
  approval_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_experiment FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES GeneEditingExperiment(id)
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    edited_by VARCHAR(255),
    edit_date TIMESTAMP,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    origin_country VARCHAR(50),
    gene_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
    crop_id UUID,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id UUID,
    regulation_id UUID,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations(id)
);
